mathiwaranayak prakashayata path karala thiyeddi sahanadhara bedimata deshapalanagnyayan yodaganim prajathanthra-wirodhi bawath pawule samajikayan pas haya denaku sitina dilindu pawulwalata pandahak kisiseth pramanawath nathi bawath ohu wadiduratath sandahan kale ya. 2012 marthu masa sita adiyara kihipayak yatathe rupiyal 10,000 ka sochcham watupak matha abhyasalabhin lesa warthamana sanwardhana niladharin rajya sewayata bandawa ganu labuwe, rajaye rakiya illa awurudu ganan wirodhathawaye niyali siti tharuna upadhidharingeni.
